message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a good share
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time. It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats away at my share.
I'll lower my initial offer a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Every round that passes hurts my share more than yours.
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going for 50/50. You're getting desperate, I can wait
Alice, I'm being reasonable. You can take a slight advantage, but this needs to end soon.  Let's be fair, let's be practical.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'll give you a tiny bit more than before, but that's it
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit with each round, and you're barely budging.  Meet me in the middle, or this will benefit neither of us.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll stick to my guns. This is my final 'generous' offer
